title: Tadej Poga훾ar Wants No Action Taken against Fan Who Shoved Him at the Giro: CPA President
content:
Riders' association president Adam Hansen says Poga훾ar asked CPA not to start proceedings against spectator who shoved him during Giro: 'It's an old man.'

Read the full article at Tadej Poga훾ar Wants No Action Taken against Fan Who Shoved Him at the Giro: CPA President on Velo.
author: sstokes
